How to Acquire Fireball

Fireball can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Wizard, Warlock, Light Domain Fireball can be cast by using the following Items: Crooked Wand of Fireballs: Range: Melee (basically self-destruct) / Use: Short Rest / Location: Underdark - Decrepit Village [X:55, Y:-184] There will be 2 Dead Duergar and an Executed Deep Gnome. The item should be on the Deep Gnome. You can avoid the damage if user is an evocation wizard. Incan
